h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
content: If you notice it make a strange gesture with its hands, it will summon two smaller tree-like enemies to assist it that can also perform a variety of kicks, but have much less health.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Blooms'.
The content is as follows:
If you notice it make a strange gesture with its hands, it will summon two smaller tree-like enemies to assist it that can also perform a variety of kicks, but have much less health.
